attributes.action: Make all credit card companies facilitate a blocking facility of gambling sites
attributes.additional_details: Please help get credit card companies to put blocking mechanism on cards to block all payments to gambling companies unless expressly agreed by card owner
attributes.background:
My son run up thousands of pounds  there is no blocking facility available 
We want a choice  NOT to authorise  these gambling company payments !

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

In any case, the decision to add extra security checks when using credit cards would be an operational decision for credit card companies, not the Government or Parliament. 

If you want a ban on credit cards being used for gambling, you may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/213506
